ul.li: Optimized outbound route security: the administrator can limit how many outbound calls the extension
users can make during a specific time (Settings > PBX > Call Control > Outbound Restriction).
Optimized Local SIP Port: the system has a default IP auto defense rule for the local SIP ports.
Optimized extension registration security: only the registered extension can dial out, direct IP call is
Optimized extension registration security: added support for user agent registration authorization
(Settings > General > SIP > Advanced > SIP > User Agent Registration Authorization). Fill in user
agent prefixes in the User Agent Registration Authorization field, only the matched user agent can
Optimized extension/trunk registration security: the system will not reply OPTIONS packets from
Optimized CDR feature: users can choose to show “Caller IP Address” in the CDR log.
Fixed Queue: the call duration time was incorrect.
Fixed Queue: “Ring in Use” was disabled, and the queue strategy wasn’t “Ring All”, but the agent who
was in a call still could receive a new call.
Fixed the Ring Group: if there were more than 50 members in the group, and the ring strategy was
“Ring All”, the system would not ring all the members if a call reached the ring group.
